title: Looking for Ranked 5s Team (for ward reward)
body: Looking for a ranked team. I'm a gold/silver player looking to play some games to get the ward achievement before season ends. Not overly worried about what level player i'm playing with, just looking to have some fun. Needs to be a pretty active team so we get at least the 20 points. Add me: voidnz if interested. I am ok at all positions but main Toplane and Support

replies.body:
Yo add me, im wanting to do the same as well
IGN: The Gingninj69 
i can play anything
